title: [Widow's Beach, Sandbar]
description: The sandbar abruptly ends here, and piles of rocks loosely pushed together form a bridge continuing onward.  Waves snake through the rockpiles as they roll to and from the beach, creating tiny, white-capped swirls.  Strange, cylindrical pillars of carved stone are positioned as handholds along the uneven path.

The sandbar suddenly stops, and piles of rocks loosely pushed together form a bridge continuing onward.  The waves running down the beach snake through the rocks as they roll by.  Strange, cylindrical pillars of carved stone are positioned as hand holds along the uneven path.
